data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Zhongshan.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhongshan, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 103,475 believers in Zhongshan to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 103,475 believers in Zhongshan to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,260,525 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Zhongshan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the E people might believe through him.
Spirit, please give every church in the county of Zhongshan a passion to plant another simple church.
There are 1,364,000 people living in the county of Zhongshan. Only about 103,475 might be believers.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Zhongshan with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

location.name: Zhongshan
location.people_groups_list: Japanese, Persian, Iu Mien, Malay, Hui, Muslim Chinese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Japanese (13,000), Persian (800), Iu Mien (1,303,000), Malay (15,000), Hui, Muslim Chinese (37,000)
